title: Encouraging Next-Generation Leaders to Explore
itunes:title: Encouraging Next-Generation Leaders to Explore
description:
Erin Lewellen, CEO of Global Citizen Year, discusses the positive impact taking a gap year between high school and college can have on students. 

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Kriti Gupta. Producer: Sara Livezey.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
